payload.name: Aqua Discardbug
payload.description: This is a strong, bleed-heavy team that also can apply various other debuffs to slow the opponent down.

characters.name: Aqua
cards: Nimo, Tiny Fan, Gill or Bubblemaker
characters.description: This is your backline damage-heavy axie, capable of fearing opponents with Balloon to power up the Bug's Sandal and generating energy with Nimo.

characters.name: Bug
characters.description: This is the anti-healer of the team that also can give your opponent Goo cards and bleeds.

characters.name: Bug
characters.description: This is your 2nd bug axie that can dish out heavy damage thanks to Sandal, while also applying bleeds.

payload.name: Plant Double Aqua
payload.description: Plant Double Aqua is a high damage team. Both Aqua axies can finish most enemy axies in one full combo and still put up a decent shield.

characters.name: Plant
characters.description: This is your frontline Plant tank axie that despite being a tank, also can deal damage with Wooden Stab. Body parts include: Serious, Beech, Pumpkin, Cattail.

characters.name: Aqua
characters.description: This is your midline Aqua axie that can reliably speed past any opposing axie and damage them down before they make their turn. Body parts include: Piranha, Shoal Star, Goldfish, Koi.

characters.name: Aqua
characters.description: This is your backline Aqua axie that can also speed itself up & generate energy thanks to Nimo. Body parts include: Piranha, Arco, Risky Beast, Nimo.

payload.name: Identity Issues Double Aqua
payload.description: The Identity Issues Double Aqua is versatile, powerful, and difficult to counter. It's focused on doing high damage with both aqua axies along with a high damage plant axie.

characters.name: Plant
characters.description: This axie is meant to soak damage for the rest of the team, while applying some heavy damage of its own with Sandal.

characters.name: Aqua
cards: Bubblemaker, Gill, Tiny Fan or Nimo
characters.description: High damage aqua axie with some energy gain. It can bypass shields with Arco and dish heavy single turn damage with Risky Beast and Fish.

characters.name: Aqua
cards: Bubblemaker, Gill, Tiny Fan or Nimo
characters.description: High damage aqua axie that can apply Bleeds and wake teammates with Cuckoo.

payload.name: Immortal Plant Bird
payload.description: This team can put out deceptively high damage, thanks to damage-hybrid Plants and a powerful Bird axie in the back.

characters.name: Plant
characters.description: This is the damage-tank hybrid of the team, that can put out strong damage with Sandal that powers up after a successful Hatsune shield.

characters.name: Plant
characters.description: This Plant is the cleanser of the team, able to removes debuffs with Bidens and provide shielding with Hatsune.

characters.name: Bird
cards: Peace Maker, Risky Bird or Pink Cheek
characters.description: This is the primary damage dealer of the team that can divert attention with Eggshell and take out enemies with high damage cards.

payload.name: God Mech Reflectile
payload.description: This team is designed to put out heavy damage while also offering resilience in the late game. The main feature is the Reptile axie who offers unmatched shielding while also providing heavy damage later in the game with Tiny Dino.

characters.name: Reptile
characters.description: A tanky, but high-damage dealing axie designed to reflect & shield most of incoming damage in the late game.

characters.name: Mech
characters.description: A high damage axie focusing on powering up Nut Cracker cards for late game damage.

characters.name: Plant
characters.description: Your frontline tank, delaying the game for the other two axies on the team but also capable of dealing damage with Sandal.

payload.name: Aqua Reflectile
payload.description: This team is a V2 Classic favorite, featuring an Origin-relevant lineup of a tanky backline Reptile, a high damage Aqua, and a high damage Dusk frontline.

characters.name: Reptile
characters.description: This is your backline game closer, the Reptile. It features a strong scaling card with Tiny Dino and can prolong the game with it's shield cards. In the 1 vs 1, it excels.

characters.name: Aqua
characters.description: This is a high-utility Aqua axie that can bypass shields, reduce heals, apply bleeds & generate energy.

characters.name: Dusk
characters.description: This is the frontline axie of the team that can put out a lot of damage thanks to Sandal and its powerup source, Caterpillars.
